meta.title: About Us | Ez.Park
meta.description: About us - GS Holding and Ez.Park

content.intro: GS Holding is an investor developing industrial real estate and infrastructure, with 08 years of formation and development, operating in key areas.
content.note1: GS Holding focuses on investing in localities with high potential, anticipating the wave of production relocation.
content.note2: While contributing to local socio-economic development, creating sustainable jobs and harmonizing with the environment.

cards: A chain of industrial zones and industrial infrastructure services developed by GS Holding, oriented towards a green – smart – sustainable model.

Focus on building high-quality industrial land fund, synchronized technical infrastructure and full support services to meet the investment and production expansion needs of domestic and international enterprises.

With a multi-point development strategy, Ez.Park currently owns 03 industrial zones in Bac Ninh, Ha Tinh and Dak Lak, covering key economic regions, creating connectivity advantages and long-term development for investors.

meta.title: Milestones of Ez.Park | Ez.Park
meta.description: Milestones of Ez.Park - Comprehensive infrastructure ecosystem

legacy.intro: <brand>EZ.PARK</brand> is built from a comprehensive infrastructure ecosystem, green – sustainable development, connecting the business community and operating to <esg>ESG</esg> standards.

comprehensive.desc2: optimize costs and shorten project implementation time.
